attributes.action: Hazard for Health caused by living with  Mould
attributes.additional_details:
The Housing Health and Safety Rating system has identified Mould in properties as a Class 1 Hazard, the same classification as Asbestos.
There is strong evidence to suggest living with mould is linked with Respiratory complications. Young children under School age are more likely to be affected as are the elderly, the immune supressed, Aids sufferers, CFS. COPD. and there are many other health problems. We need public awareness through our Health Services. as I, like many others are dying from the effects of Mould.
